data.lyric:
[ti:Sleigh Ride]
[ar:The Ronettes]
[al:NOW That's What I Call Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Sleigh Ride - The Ronettes
[00:10.54]Just hear those sleigh bells jingle-ing
[00:21.08]Ring ting tingle-ing too
[00:31.63]Come on it's lovely weather
[00:33.00]For a sleigh ride together with you
[00:35.49]
[00:36.43]Outside the snow is falling
[00:38.36]And friends are calling Yoo Hoo
[00:40.68]
[00:41.73]Come on it's lovely weather
[00:43.42]For a sleigh ride together with you
[00:45.85]
[00:59.89]Our cheeks are nice and rosy
[01:01.95]And comfy cozy are we
[01:03.82]
[01:05.19]We're snuggled up together like two
[01:07.44]Birds of a feather would be
[01:09.25]
[01:10.25]Let's take the road before us
[01:12.25]And sing a chorus or two
[01:14.31]
[01:15.49]Come on it's lovely weather
[01:17.18]For a sleigh ride together with you
[01:20.11]
[02:08.16]Our cheeks are nice and rosy
[02:10.16]And comfy cozy are we
[02:12.40]
[02:13.65]We're snuggled up together like two
[02:15.96]Birds of a feather would be
[02:17.83]
[02:18.70]Let's take the road before us
[02:20.76]And sing a chorus or two
[02:22.95]
[02:24.26]Come on it's lovely weather
[02:25.88]For a sleigh ride together with you
data.trans:
[ti:Sleigh Ride]
[ar:The Ronettes]
[al:NOW That's What I Call Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:10.54]刚刚听见了雪橇铃叮铃铃响声
[00:21.08]叮叮铃铃响声
[00:31.63]来吧 在这可爱的季节里
[00:33.00]与你一起骑雪橇
[00:35.49]
[00:36.43]外面雪花飘落
[00:38.36]朋友们高声呼喊
[00:40.68]
[00:41.73]来吧 在这可爱的季节里
[00:43.42]与你一起骑雪橇
[00:45.85]
[00:59.89]我们的脸颊美丽又红润
[01:01.95]因为此时我们是如此惬意
[01:03.82]
[01:05.19]我们依偎在一起
[01:07.44]像是相互依靠的小鸟
[01:09.25]
[01:10.25]让我们向前走
[01:12.25]一起唱一两首歌吧
[01:14.31]
[01:15.49]来吧 在这可爱的季节里
[01:17.18]与你一起骑雪橇
[01:20.11]
[02:08.16]我们的脸颊美丽又红润
[02:10.16]因为此时我们是如此惬意
[02:12.40]
[02:13.65]我们的脸颊美丽又红润
[02:15.96]像是相互依靠的小鸟
[02:17.83]
[02:18.70]让我们向前走
[02:20.76]一起唱一两首歌吧
[02:22.95]
[02:24.26]来吧 在这可爱的季节里
[02:25.88]与你一起骑雪橇
